_header: Late as I went on mine playing / I set my heart all in solace
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man — fourteen 8-line stanzas with the refrain, ‘Quid vltra debui facere’

BodRawC86.First Lines:
Late as I Wente on myn pleyngeI set my herte all in
                    solase…
BodRawC86.Last Lines:
…I wyll befor þe at þynne endeQuid vltra debui
                        facere

Sandison,  Helen Estabrook. 
             The ‘Chanson d’Aventure’ in Middle English.
Bryn Mawr College Monographs,  Monograph Series 12. Bryn Mawr, PA: Bryn Mawr College, 1913: 110-13.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 159-62.
